      Methods in com.noctarius.replikate with parameters of type Journal 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ReplayNotificationResult JournalListener.onReplayRecordId(Journal<V> journal, JournalRecord<V> record)
      This method is called when during startup of the Journal implementation a previous journal was found and records replayed.
      ReplayNotificationResult JournalListener.onReplaySuspiciousRecordId(Journal<V> journal, JournalRecord<V> lastRecord, JournalRecord<V> currentRecord)
      This callback method is called when during journal replaying a missing recordId or other suspicious events arise.
